title: Online Shopping
description: An exploration of how to shop safely and effectively online, including risk mitigation strategies and consumer protection.
learning_objectives: Identify the benefits and risks of online shopping
Evaluate the security of online retailers and payment methods
Apply strategies to protect personal and financial information while shopping online
Compare online and in-store shopping options for various products
Understand consumer rights and protections when shopping online

skill_builder.title: Online vs. In-Store Purchase Analysis
skill_builder.description: An interactive activity where students compare the advantages and disadvantages of online versus in-store purchases.
